Hi everyone This update brings you one great feature: iCloud Sync! If you like to access your projects from all of your devices go to the app settings and enable iCloud Sync. It only syncs your new projects after you enable it. In order to sync an old project you should export it once again. Bug fixes and performance improvements. New Templates every Tuesday and Friday!

Media CAROUSEL MOTIONS New Text Animations Carousel: We make it easy for you to create slideshows. From now on you can add multiple media into a single canvas and then choose your media animation. The media carousel is created automatically. Motions: You know the Zoom in out feature using which you give a pretty motion to your media. Now there are other options like moving right left up and down. Now it s your turn to hold the camera! Text animations: Speech bubbles Bullet list Transparent text Text on a ribbon and fancy Swipe Up s. Last but not least we have fixed some bugs to improve the performance. You ll definitely notice it. We release new templates every Monday and Thursday. Don t forget to check! We really like to hear from you about how these new features add value to your brand. Please tell us from the app chat box. Tag us impressoapp and madewithimpresso so we can feature your videos. If you enjoy Impresso please leave your review in the App Store.

NEW FEATURE: Video Effects You know we want to give you full control on your videos. Now it s time to add some video effects to dazzle your audience. Snow rain confetti various effects. Go and find them under the Style menu. Second is we have changed the media menu a bit. From now on you can resize move crop rotate duplicate and delete the media on the editor with ease. Don t forget that we are rolling out new templates every Monday Wednesday and Friday. Easter templates are on the Trending category. We really like to hear from you about how these new features add value to your brand. Please tell us from the app chat box. Tag us impressoapp and madewithimpresso so we can feature your videos. If you enjoy Impresso please leave your review in the App Store.

Cropping your media is much easier now! If you like to change the visible area of your media just drag it. If you like to change the position of the media like before tap on the Position tab on the bottom menu and just drag it until you are done. There are also a few shortcuts for you to adjust your media position. Other than that we have added new templates as always and made several performance improvements. We really like to hear from you about how these new features add value to your brand. Please tell us from the app chat box. Tag us impressoapp and madewithimpresso so we can feature your videos. If you enjoy Impresso please leave your review in the App Store.
Sorry for the inconvenience caused by the bug when you try to duplicate your projects. We have fixed the issue so it s vital that you update the app. Thank you for your understanding.

FRAMES! FRAMES! FRAMES! From now on you can add frames around your media. It s beautiful. You can either select your media and add any frame you like or you can pick a template from the new Frames category and use it as it is. Either way you won t believe how cool your stories become. Secondly you can start adding transitions to your logo. We really like to hear from you about how these new features add value to your brand. Please tell us from the app chat box. Huge announcement! We have lots of exciting new features to share with you as well as some improvements with this update. You now have the utmost flexibility and customization capability on each scene with both templates and layouts. Now you can: Use different layouts move each element including media to wherever you want on each scene Use media at different sizes and shapes on each scene Duplicate media and add as much media as you like on each scene Can remove media from any scene Align each element including text media and logo easily with smart snapping Even up the distance between aligned elements including text media and logo easily with a guideline Undo changes even after you tap done and revert back. If you have any questions or feedback write to us at support impresso.com or from the chat box in the app. We d love to see and feature your videos. Tag us impressoapp madewithimpresso . If you enjoy Impresso please leave your review in the App Store.

This update allows you to add background images from your gallery or stock images to enliven your photos.
In this update we bring you the ability to replace the current logo in your project with another one as well as some bug fixes and performance improvements!
Bug fixes and performance improvements

In this roll out we are bringing you two major features: LOGO and OPACITY. You can now add your brands logo to your videos! We offer you logo positioning placement options such as intro outro left or right upper corners more. With this update you can also adjust the opacity of each element in your videos: texts text backgrounds text effects photos videos. This will enable you to create different combinations and extend your creativity while making videos that connect with your audience. Please continue to share your thoughts and feedback with us over chat on Impresso or send an email to support impresso.com.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

We are bringing you a breakthrough update that will carry Impresso to the next stage. You can now use COLLAGES in your videos. Just tap on the button and pick from multiple minimalist collage layouts. We all make occasional editing mistakes so if you decide that you want to return to your preferred previous version edit all you need to do is tap the UNDO button and voila! We are also bringing you new editing features to improve your editing experience. You can now find a timeline that clearly shows the scenes of your video in an organized linear manner. Besides opacity of each media and text are now adjustable. Please continue to share your thoughts and feedback with us over chat on Impresso or send an email to support impresso.com.

Impresso is already a great tool for your photos and videos. Now it is becoming extremely useful even if you don t have attractive photos videos. Unsplash Pexel and Pixabay are here to save the day for you. With this update you will be able to take advantage of their stock library filled with high quality royalty free photos and videos. To contribute improving Impresso please share your thoughts and feedback with us over chat on Impresso or sending an email to support impresso.com.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

This update is about enhancing our text animation library improving your overall video making experience by adding a new editing feature. We know some of you are pretty detailed oriented with your videos so we wanted to help with any challenges by bringing you the new text feature NUDGE. This enables you to place the text precisely where you want it to go. By using NUDGE you can adjust the position of the text in your video on the pixel level. Besides text positioning we also bring you the new text animation TEXT SHIFTING IN DIAGONAL which appears letter by letter giving you the text slowly but effectively. Thus providing you more options for the appearance of text in your videos. In addition to these we made several performance improvements and bug fixes. We are continuously trying to improve Impresso. Please share your thoughts and feedback with us over chat on Impresso or by sending an email to support impresso.com.

It has been a while since we have last came up with new features. This break was for something BIG. We mean really BIG groundbreaking BIG. Here is Impresso 2.0 which you will be amazed by its advanced customization features along with the brand new template style. With Impresso 2.0 you will be able to utilize our rich text animation library customize color of each element in your video add more than one texts in single multiline format adjust the time for each photo video appears in your video exporting videos in 1080p and have many more features you will enjoy using. There are plenty of new features on the way. Keep following us for much more. To contribute improving Impresso please share your thoughts and feedback with us over chat on Impresso or sending an email to support impresso.com.

Impresso is all about helping you engage with your audience on social media so understanding what you need is what really matters to us. Of course we have an understanding of what you like and what you don t but why don t we take it to the next level With this update we are making our communication crystal clear. You will be able to write down your thoughts and feedback in an instant. Just tap on the little question mark icon on top right corner of your screen and share what you think. We will do our best to meet your demands as soon as possible.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

It ain t over till it s over! If we had to sum up this release with one sentence this would be it. Even if you think you are done with editing your video we know you will want to get back and make one last edit. Even if it s over it s not yet over. That s why we made this update to enable you edit your final video. Also we added some performance improvements and bug fixes too. We are in a continuous effort to improve Impresso. Please share your thoughts and feedbacks with us at support impresso.com
